tools.name: create_album
tools.description: Create a new photo album, optionally based on search results from photo library.

album_name.description: The name of the album to be created

album_type.description: The type of the album, default to normal

search_query.description: Optional. Search keyword or filter to find photos (e.g., 'beach', 'family', '2024 vacation'). The album will include the photos matching this query.

keyword.description: The search keyword for photos or images. It can be descriptive text or a file name, e.g., 'photos taken last August' or 'dog on the grass'.

tools.name: get_album_list
tools.description:
Retrieve the list of photo albums, including regular albums, people albums, baby albums, conditional albums, and object recognition albums.
    Note: Either 'album_type' or 'keyword' must be provided.

album_type.description: The type of album to retrieve. Options: normal (regular album), face (people album), baby (baby album), condition (conditional album), object (object recognition album).

keyword.description: The search keyword for photos or images. It can be descriptive text or a file name, e.g., 'photos taken last August' or album named 'My Home'.

tools.name: music_play_control
tools.description:
Music control tool: play songs, albums, artists, playlists, and other music content. Supports playback modes, and retrieving content from recent history or favorites.
    Note: Either 'title' or 'source' must be provided.

title.description: Name or title of the music content

source.description: Content source: recent=recently played, favorites=liked songs, playlist=songs in this playlist. Only specify when user explicitly mentions recent or favorite content.

play_mode.description: Playback mode: normal=sequential, random=shuffle, single=repeat single track, loop=repeat all, default to normal

tools.name: music_search_control
tools.description: Music search tool: search for songs, albums, artists, or playlists based on keyword.

keyword.description: Search keyword, such as song name, artist name, or album title.

auto_stop_time.description: Set sleep timer duration, for example, stop playback after 15 minutes

tools.name: video_search_control
tools.description: Video search tool: search TV series, movies, specific titles in the media library, and other video content.

title.description: Name or title of the video content, supports fuzzy matching.

type.description: Content type: tv=TV series/drama, movie=films/blockbusters, collection=movie series/collections. Default to all.

source.description: Content source: recent=recently played, favorites=liked videos, media_library=videos in media library. Only specify when the user explicitly mentions recent, favorite or media library content.

tools.name: video_play_control
tools.description: Video play tool: play TV series, movies, specific titles from the media library, and other video content. Supports retrieving content from recently watched history, favorites and media libraries.

title.description: Name or title of the video content, supports fuzzy matching.

type.description: Content type: tv=TV series/drama, movie=films/blockbusters, collection=movie series/collections, all=all of above content type ('tv', 'movie', 'collection'). Default to all.

source.description: Content source: recent=recently played, favorites=liked videos, media_library=videos in media library. Only specify when the user explicitly mentions recent, favorite or media library content.

tools.name: get_system_info
tools.description: Retrieves detailed information about the device, including operating system details, hardware specifications, storage status, network configuration, and UGREEN Link account information.

system_type.description: The category of system information to retrieve: 'system' for OS and system info, 'device' for device-specific details, 'hardware' for CPU and memory specs, 'storage' for disk and storage status, 'network' for network configuration, 'uglink' for UGREEN Link account information.

tools.name: get_weather
tools.description: Returns the weather for a given city.

city.description: The city to get the weather for.

tools.name: general_knowledge_query
tools.description: Questions about general knowledge or topics not related to NAS.

query.description: The user's general question or statement.

tools.name: summary_document
tools.description: Summarize the content of a document or report.

document_id.description: The identifier or path of the document to summarize.

tools.name: search_document
tools.description: Locate specific documents or files based on keywords. Often includes terms like "document", "file", or "report".

tools.name: translate
tools.description: Translate text or documents into a specified language.

text.description: The text content to be translated.
